name: AmariLevel
short: Check your amari level but through red.
description: If you are the bot owner you will need an amari api token for this to work. You can apply for one in their support server [here](https://discord.gg/kqefESMzQj). Then set it with `[p]set api amari auth,<your_api_key>`.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not store any end user data whatsoever.
install_msg: Thank you for installing AmariLevel. Load the cog with `[p]load amarilevel`.
author: NoobInDaHause
